remarks: Membership in subspace sum for partial isomorphism B. (Contributed by NM, 21-Sep-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2015.)
statement:
diblsmopel.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
diblsmopel.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
diblsmopel.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
diblsmopel.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
diblsmopel.o $e |- O = ( f e. T |-> ( _I |` B ) ) $.
diblsmopel.v $e |- V = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
diblsmopel.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
diblsmopel.q $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` V ) $.
diblsmopel.p $e |- .+b = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
diblsmopel.j $e |- J = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
diblsmopel.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
diblsmopel.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
diblsmopel.x $e |- ( ph -> ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) ) $.
diblsmopel.y $e |- ( ph -> ( Y e. B /\ Y .<_ W ) ) $.
diblsmopel $p |- ( ph -> ( <. F , S >. e. ( ( I ` X ) .+b ( I ` Y ) ) <-> ( F e. ( ( J ` X ) .(+) ( J ` Y ) ) /\ S = O ) ) ) $.
$d B f $.
$d H f $.
$d K f $.
$d T f $.
$d W f $.
